#Aggregating deta (hint group by use where each word used)
1. select count(order_id), customer_id from orders group by customer_id;
2. select avg(amount), order_id from orders group by item;
3. select max(age),first_name,country from customers group by country;
#create order_item table
#write a sql query to retrive the total revenue generated by each customer from orders and order_iems tables?
4.Create table order_item(
  order_id int primary key,
  quantity numeric,
  price numeric);
Insert into order_item values(6,2,100);

SELECT 
    o.customer_id,
    SUM(oi.quantity * oi.price) AS total_revenue
FROM 
    orders o
JOIN 
    order_item oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id
GROUP BY 
    o.customer_id
ORDER BY 
    total_revenue DESC;
